text: Yehoshua Matza (, 8 August 1931 â€“ 30 December 2020) was an Israeli politician, economist and businessman. He was born and died in Jerusalem. He was president and CEO of State of Israel Bonds. From 1984 to 2002, he was a member of the Likud. From 1996 to 1999, Matza was Minister of Health during the first Benjamin Netanyahu cabinet. Matza died on 30 December 2020 at the age of 89.Former Health Minister, Israel Bonds CEO Yehoshua mtaza dies aged 89 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Jerusalem Category:Israeli businesspeople Category:Israeli economists
title: Yehoshua Matza
